<style>
body {
    font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
    background-color: #fafbfc;
    color: #2d3748;
    line-height: 1.6;
}

.hero-banner {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
    color: white;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 40px 20px;
    border-radius: 16px;
    margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.hero-banner h1 {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    margin-bottom: 12px;
}

.hero-banner p {
    font-size: 1.1rem;
    opacity: 0.9;
    max-width: 600px;
    margin: 0 auto;
}

.stats-row {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(150px, 1fr));
    gap: 20px;
    margin: 30px 0;
}

.stat-card {
    background: white;
    padding: 20px;
    border-radius: 12px;
    text-align: center;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
    border: 1px solid #e2e8f0;
}

.stat-number {
    font-size: 2rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #667eea;
    display: block;
}

.stat-label {
    color: #4a5568;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    font-weight: 500;
}

.section-card {
    background: white;
    border-radius: 12px;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
    padding: 30px;
    margin-bottom: 30px;
    border: 1px solid #e2e8f0;
}

.section-card h2 {
    color: #2563eb;
    font-size: 1.8rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    border-bottom: 3px solid #2563eb;
    padding-bottom: 8px;
}

.section-card h3 {
    color: #2d3748;
    font-size: 1.4rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    margin: 25px 0 15px 0;
    border-left: 4px solid #10b981;
    padding-left: 12px;
}

.phd-card {
    background: #f8fafc;
    border: 1px solid #e2e8f0;
    border-radius: 12px;
    padding: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 20px;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.phd-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-2px);
    box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    border-color: #667eea;
}

.cropped-image {
    width: 120px;
    height: 120px;
    object-fit: cover;
    border-radius: 8px;
    border: 2px solid #e2e8f0;
    transition: border-color 0.3s;
    flex-shrink: 0;
}

.cropped-image:hover {
    border-color: #667eea;
}

.phd-info {
    flex: 1;
}

.phd-name {
    font-size: 1.3rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: #2d3748;
    margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.phd-duration {
    color: #667eea;
    font-weight: 500;
    font-size: 0.95rem;
    margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.alumni-list {
    display: grid;
    gap: 12px;
}

.alumni-item {
    background: #f8fafc;
    padding: 16px;
    border-radius: 8px;
    border-left: 4px solid #e2e8f0;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.alumni-item:hover {
    border-left-color: #667eea;
    background: #eff6ff;
    transform: translateX(4px);
}

.alumni-name {
    font-weight: 600;
    color: #2d3748;
}

.alumni-details {
    color: #4a5568;
    margin-top: 4px;
}

/* Consistent styling for all organizations */
.university {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
    color: white;
    padding: 3px 8px;
    border-radius: 4px;
    font-size: 0.85rem;
    font-weight: 500;
}

.company {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #10b981 0%, #059669 100%);
    color: white;
    padding: 3px 8px;
    border-radius: 4px;
    font-size: 0.85rem;
    font-weight: 500;
}

.startup {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f59e0b 0%, #d97706 100%);
    color: white;
    padding: 3px 8px;
    border-radius: 4px;
    font-size: 0.85rem;
    font-weight: 500;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .hero-banner h1 {
        font-size: 2rem;
    }
    
    .phd-card {
        flex-direction: column;
        text-align: center;
    }
    
    .cropped-image {
        width: 100px;
        height: 100px;
    }
    
    .stats-row {
        grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
    }
}
</style>
